sentences.cn: …一项有关商业性捕鲸的禁令。

sentences.en: By 1986, the Commission had passed a moratorium on commercial whaling.
sentences.cn: 到1986年, 该委员会通过了一项暂停商业性捕鲸的决定.

sentences.en: Communities on the island depended on whaling for their livelihood.
sentences.cn: 岛上的居民靠捕鲸为生。

sentences.en: Gleen Cordinier is curator of the Whaling Museum here in Mystic , Connecticut.
sentences.cn: 格伦·迪尼埃是此地康涅狄格州米斯蒂克的捕鲸博物馆馆长.

sentences.en: Hundreds of years of whaling have nearly wiped them out.
sentences.cn: 几百年来的捕鲸几乎使它们濒临灭绝.

sentences.en: Lucy has been whaling away on the typewriter for two hours.
sentences.cn: 露西不停地打字,已有两个小时了.

sentences.en: Melville incorporated in " Moby Dick " an exhaustive encyclopaedia of whaling lore.
sentences.cn: 梅尔维尔在《白鲸 》 中汇集了各种捕鲸知识.

sentences.en: Men went whaling to get the valuable oil, meat, and bones of whale.
sentences.cn: 人们捕鲸是为了获得宝贵的鲸油 、 鲸肉和鲸骨.

sentences.en: The boxer is whaling away at his opponent with both fist.
sentences.cn: 那拳师用双拳猛击对手.

sentences.en: The commission is calling for a global ban on whaling.
sentences.cn: 委员会要求全球禁止捕鲸。

sentences.en: The lookout on a whaling ship has sighted a spouting whale.
sentences.cn: 捕鲸船上的了望者看到了一头正在喷气的鲸鱼.

sentences.en: The uncontrolled whaling may put the whales out of existence.
The whaling fleet began to fill away on a northerly course.
sentences.cn: 捕鲸船队开始向北乘风前进.

sentences.en: The whaling ship came to grief on a hidden rock.
They cynically tried to trade off a reduction in the slaughter of dolphins against a resumption of commercial whaling.
sentences.cn: 他们见利忘义地试图以减少屠杀海豚数量作为交换条件，重启商业捕鲸。

sentences.en: Yojo stare that you are to pick the whaling ship.
sentences.cn: 约约说你必须自己挑选捕鲸船.

phrases.tran_cn: [美国口语]了不起的，非常大的，极大的；极好的，精彩的
巨头鲸；抹香鲸（等于Physeter catodon）
